Name: BigBoy - Visual Novel
About the game: Witness to the sections of BigBoy's life sucked into a vortex of crime. Is there divine justice? BigBoy is a visual crime novel in a black and white style. This is the prologue of the story. Features 48 Scenes Languages: English & Turkish Black & White art style 1 Ending Auto Save Unique Storyline GamePlay Pull that trigger, be part of the story!
